Net Cash from Financing Activities: net cash provided by used in financing activities continuing operations abstract
Proceeds from Debt: proceeds from issuance of long term debt
proceeds from repayments of commercial paper
proceeds from repayments of related party debt
proceeds from repayments of short term debt
Repayment of Debt: repayments of long term debt and capital securities
repayments of other short term debt
Stock Repurchases: payments for repurchase of common stock

Acquisitions (net of cash acquired): payments to acquire businesses net of cash acquired
Capital Expenditures: payments to acquire property plant and equipment
Net Cash from Investing Activities: net cash provided by used in investing activities continuing operations abstract
Sales and Maturities of Investments: proceeds from sale maturity and collections of investments

Net Change in Cash: cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents period increase decrease including exchange rate effect

Changes in Operating Assets and Liabilit: increase decrease in accounts and other receivables
increase decrease in accounts payable and accrued liabilities
increase decrease in income taxes payable net of income taxes receivable
increase decrease in prepaid deferred expense and other assets
Net Cash from Operating Activities: net cash provided by used in continuing operations
net cash provided by used in operating activities continuing operations abstract
Other Non-Cash Items: business combination contingent consideration arrangements change in amount of contingent consideration liability1
gain loss on sale of other assets
impacts related to u. s. tax reform
impairment of intangible assets excluding goodwill
non cash litigation reserve adjustments net of cash payments
payment for contingent consideration liability operating activities
research and development asset acquired other than through business combination written off

__unmapped__: effect of exchange rate on cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents
foreign currency transaction loss before tax
payments to acquire businesses and interest in affiliates
